queries.query: SELECT CT.Name AS City, WF.Date AS Date, WF.TemperatureC AS TemperatureC, WF.Summary AS Summary FROM WEATHERFORECAST AS WF INNER JOIN CITY AS CT ON CT.Id = WF.CityId ${whereConditions} ORDER BY WF.Date DESC ${paginationConditions}
SELECT CT.Id AS Id FROM CITY AS CT ${whereConditions}
INSERT INTO CITY (Name) OUTPUT INSERTED.ID VALUES (@cityName)
INSERT INTO WEATHERFORECAST (Date, TemperatureC, Summary, CityId) VALUES (@date, @temperatureC, @summary, @cityId)

UPDATE WEATHERFORECAST SET Date = @dateValue, TemperatureC = @temperatureCValue, Summary = @summaryText, CityId = (SELECT TOP (1) CT.Id FROM CITY AS CT WHERE CT.Name LIKE @cityName) ${whereConditions}
